defaultMessage: Any coast but not any picture. We need these pictures to get a closer look at coasts (not people) and we need to know where these coasts are. So these are our guidelines:

description: Header - We need the original image

defaultMessage: This means: No images from Facebook, Whatsapp or other Social Media and no scans or screenshots.
That's a no-go for data privacy reasons.
We need to see the coast material
(What do you mean by coast material?)
We honestly don't care about how beautiful (sunsets) or ugly (your toes!) the image is, as long as we can see the coast material.
Harbors, cliffs, promenades alongside the water ... anything that touches the oceans and seas.
We need close-up pictures of coasts. Basically, the coast you see in the picture should be the same as the coast you stood on when you took the picture.
